def minSubarray(nums, p):
    (n, r) = (len(nums), sum(nums) % p)
    if r != 0:
        return 0
    (prefix, postfix, min_len) = ({0: -1}, {0: n}, n + 1)
    cur = 0
    for i in range(n):
        cur = (cur + nums[i]) % p
        min_len = min(min_len, i - prefix.get((cur - r) % p, -n))
        prefix[cur] = i
    cur = 0
    for i in range(n - 1, -1, -1):
        cur = (cur + nums[i]) % p
        min_len = min(min_len, postfix.get((r - cur) % p, 2 * n) - i)
        postfix[cur] = i
    if min_len < n:
        return min_len
    return -1
